external_games.name: Train Simulator: Southern Class 455/8 EMU Add-On

name: Train Simulator 2021: Southern Class 455/8 EMU
summary: One of London's iconic commuter electric multiple units comes to Train Simulator 2021 in Southern Trains livery. Originally starting life as a Class 510, the Class 455/8 was introduced in 1982 to replace the aging 4SUB and 4EPB units. Class 455/8s were part of the first batch of units to be delivered between 1982 and 1984.
